definitions.definition: Any of several species of trees of the genus Garcinia found in South and Southeastern Asia , especially Garcinia xanthochymus .
The resin of the gamboge tree; a preparation of the resin used as a pigment or for medicinal purposes.

main_definition: Any of several species of trees of the genus Garcinia found in South and Southeastern Asia , especially Garcinia xanthochymus .
secondary_definitions: The resin of the gamboge tree; a preparation of the resin used as a pigment or for medicinal purposes. [from early 18th c.]
